title: Why the 2024 Vuelta a España Will Be Better without GC Slayers Pogačar, Vingegaard, Evenepoel
content:
Analysis: The absence of the Tour de France dominators creates a power vacuum at the top of a wide-open classification pack that should bring wild, dynamic racing.

Read the full article at Why the 2024 Vuelta a España Will Be Better without GC Slayers Pogačar, Vingegaard, Evenepoel on Velo.
author: Jim Cotton
